text: Botnets are also called:
note: Botnets are called zombies or zombie networks.

text: What did Neustar discover after surveying 450 companies?

answers.text: Companies are more secure than ever
DDoS attacks are more unpredictable than ever
There is no need for security admins

note: Neustar surveyed a variety of companies in North America and discovered (among other things) that DDoS attacks are more unpredictable than ever.

text: Cyber-attacks are intense but ____________.
note: The attacks are more focused on what the criminals want to achieve, than on crippling the system.

text: What percentage of DDoS targets in 2013 were victims of theft?
note: Fifty-five percent of DDoS targets were victims of theft: funds, customer data, or intellectual property.

text: What is an attack on the availability of IT resources called?
note: A denial-of-service is an attack on the availability of IT resources.The attack can prevent availability of IT resources to legitimate users and could be for a short duration or for a long duration.

text: A ___________ is a group of compromised computers attacking a single computer.
note: Another word for botnet is “cluster.“ A cluster is a group of compromised computers attacking a single computer.

text: Botnets can be used for good and malicious purposes.
In what kind of attack is a group of machines infected with malicious code and used to carry out an attack on a target?
note: In a DDoS attack, a group of compromised machines infected with malicious code are used to carry out an attack on a target system, network, or network resource.

text: Which of the following are kinds of detection techniques for DoS attacks?
note: We have the following three kinds of detection techniques: activity profiling, sequential change-point detection, and Wavelet analysis.A technique must be able to detect the DoS attack before the service starts to degrade, be able to react quickly, and have a low false positive rate.

text: Extortion can be conducted without a botnet.
Which part of the CIA triad gets affected by a denial-of-service or distributed denial-of-service attack?
note: A denial-of-service or distributed denial-of-service attack affects the availability part of the CIA triad as it is the primary reason for an attack. It is not to change the value of the data (attacking on integrity) or sniffing the data (attacking on confidentiality). When a DoS/DDoS attack succeeds, it will make the resource unavailable.

text: Botnets are used to carry out a denial-of-service attack and a DDoS attack.
Which attack uses many systems to launch a coordinated attack?
note: In a distributed denial-of-service attack, many computers are used in a coordinated way.

text: What can help criminal gangs to gain access to millions of infected computers resulting in sharp rise of cyber crimes committed?
note: A botnet is a collection of Internet-connected programs communicating with other similar programs in order to perform tasks. This can be as mundane as keeping control of an Internet Relay Chat (IRc. channel, or it could be used to send spam email or participate in distributed denial-of-service attacks.

text: It is possible that we may not be able to keep all the services up and running while an attack is taking place.
How can hackers affect the network when using a network bandwidth attack?

answers.text: By sending a high volume of malicious packets

note: A bandwidth attack floods a network with a high volume of malicious packets to affect the network bandwidth.

text: Which is not a symptom of a DoS/DDoS attack?
note: Credit card information theft is not a symptom of a DoS/DDoS attack.

text: Which of the following can mimic the symptoms of a denial-of-service attack that will result in loss of productivity, which can be no less devastating to an organization?
note: Insufficient bandwidth mimics the symptoms of a denial-of-service attack resulting in loss of productivity which can be no less devastating to an organization.

text: Which of the following attacks exploits the three-way handshake method?
note: TCP SYN attacks exploit the three-way handshake method.

text: Application-level denial-of-service attacks do not target higher layers in an application stack.
How many connections per second can a typical web server handle before performance begins to degrade?
note: A typical web server can handle a few hundred connections per second before performance begins to degrade.

text: Which of the following is called phlashing?
note: Permanent denial-of-service attacks are called phlashing.

text: Which of the following is not a botnet tool?
note: Low Orbit Ion Cannon is a DoS tool, not a botnet tool.

text: What should you have if you want to absorb a DoS/DDoS attack?
note: When you have additional capacity, it could absorb the DoS/DDoS attack.

text: When a DDoS attack takes place, which is more or less used up and hardly any bandwidth is used for legitimate use?
note: DDoS more or less uses up available bandwidth and leaves almost nothing for legitimate users.

text: Which tool is used for DDoS attacks?
note: High Orbit Ion Cannon is a tool developed by Anonymous hacker group for DDoS attack.
